Metadata.title: Reps
Metadata.description: 24/7 gym downtown. Full weights, turf, group classes.

Hero.headline: Train hard. Recover harder.
Hero.subheadline: Full weights floor, turf zone, and group classes. No contract. Walk in anytime.

access24.title: 24/7 access
access24.description: Early morning, late night, doesn't matter. Swipe in whenever. Members get key fob access round the clock.

weightsFloor.title: Full weights floor
weightsFloor.description: Squat racks, benches, dumbbells up to 120. Deadlift platform. Turf for sled work and carries.

groupClasses.title: Group classes
groupClasses.description: HIIT, strength, mobility. Included in membership. Book your spot in the app.

CTA.title: First visit free.
CTA.description: Drop by for a tour. No pressure. We'll get you set up if you want to join.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters

Auth.featureToast: This feature is currently being worked on.

Pricing.title: Memberships
Pricing.subtitle: Pick the plan that fits. No hidden fees.

dayPass.name: Day pass
dayPass.description: Try the gym. Full access, one day.
